[[inst_hl_lhi_po]]
==== HL.LHI.PO

*Syntax:* hl.lhi.po [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhi_po.svg[HL.LHI.PO encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/POST_INDEX
